post.body: its snowing where im at, so im feeling pretty christmasy
sometimes your tweets make me giggly and gleeful. Haha
you got what you wanted!! A two hour delay!
u must be stealing my tarot cards! Ha
its not my first choice, but i like it. Mostly its just nice to kno i hav a future =)
really? I didnt even kno that existed... Im kind of sad
true that, but these seem pretty crap free =)
true, but "graduation" was a redeeming album, i was hoping for something
"I just can't wait to get home and put my PJ's on"... said the woman wearing a sweatsuit inf front of me... oh fashion, we new ye well...
This so-called wrapping paper cutter is terrible!
"Cat conundrums" i might just hav to read it! Lol only at the old folks home!
Melba toast is gross. Not even the old people like it
Driving to work was slightly frightening, but i have mastered getting here in just under 15 minutes
Found the giant flask labeled "formaldehyde"... Dandy...
GOT IN TO BALL STATE!!!!
Washing dishes is actually really calming...
I love Mary J Blige.
Is considering this one of the most fruitless tasks of my life, but im addicted to it nontheless...
Kanye west's first performance on SNL was disappointingly bad
Just got the most sleep ive had in like a month...
